Good quality.. Although.. Who ever did the ID3 Tags/Album Info is fucked in the head... "Khaos Overture" was in a different album then the rest of CD1... Corrected them all now and added album art...

Actually... Had to use fucked Windows Media Player to correct this.. iTunes would not even if all of them were set to same artist same album... If yall wanna fix this open up CD1 in WMP and select all then click   get info.. :D
